name: Microsoft Word代码执行漏洞（CNVD-2025-17488）
product: ["Microsoft Office Web Apps Server 2013 SP1", "Microsoft Word 2016", "Microsoft Office Online Server", "Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016", "Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2013 Service Pack 1", "Microsoft Office 2019 for Mac", "Microsoft Word 2013 RT Service Pack 1", "Microsoft SharePoint Server 2019", "Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise", "Microsoft  SharePoint Server Subscription Edition", "Microsoft Word 2013 Service Pack 1", "Microsoft Office LTSC for Mac 2021", "Microsoft SharePoint Server Subscription Edition Language Pack"]
description: Microsoft Word是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一套Office套件中的文字处理软件。Microsoft Word存在代码执行漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞在系统上执行任意代码。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：
https://portal.msrc.microsoft.com/en-US/security-guidance/advisory/CVE-2022-41061
patch: Microsoft Word代码执行漏洞（CNVD-2025-17488）的补丁
